Package adrenaline.model.deck

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.model.deck.Card
      • adrenaline.model.deck.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Weapon
extends Card
    Weapon is a Card which contains the description about a single weapon available in the game and its effects
